advanced.question: Which C++ feature allows objects of different classes to be treated as objects of a common superclass?
advanced.hint: This feature provides the ability to call derived class methods through base class pointers.

advanced.question: In C++, what is the primary advantage of using a smart pointer over a raw pointer?
advanced.hint: This feature helps in preventing memory leaks by automatically deallocating memory when it's no longer needed.

advanced.question: What is the primary role of a mutex in multithreading in C++?
advanced.hint: This mechanism is crucial for preventing data races when multiple threads access shared data.

advanced.question: How does C++ ensure type safety and prevent data corruption when dealing with multiple data types?
advanced.hint: This feature allows functions and classes to operate with generic types.

advanced.hint: This library provides an object-relational mapping (ORM) framework for C++.
